item.title: [ Leetcode ] 2114. Maximum Number of Words Found in Sentences(C#)
item.description: A sentence is a list of words that are separated by a single space with no leading or trailing spaces. You are given an array of strings sentences, where each sentences[i] represents a single sentence. Return the maximum number of words that appear in a single sentence.
